channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: All the biggest news from AWS’ big tech show re:Invent 2025
item.description: Amazon Web Services giant tech conference is happening this week with news ranging from chips to AI services.

item.title: After intense backlash, India pulls mandate to pre-install government app on smartphones
item.description: On Wednesday, the Indian telecom ministry said Sanchar Saathi, an anti-theft and cybersecurity protection app, would remain voluntary, and that smartp...

item.title: Healthify upgrades its AI assistant Ria with real-time conversation capabilities
item.description: Healtify is adding live conversation capabilities to its AI assistant, powered by OpenAI's realtime APIs

item.title: Amazon challenges competitors with on-premises Nvidia ‘AI Factories’
item.description: If the product name sounds familiar, it should. It's a collab with Nvidia that combines AWS tech with the chip maker's tech.

item.title: Uber and Avride launch robotaxi service in Dallas
item.description: The robotaxis will initially have a human safety operator behind the wheel who will monitor the ride.

item.title: The 157 Best Cyber Week Deals—Save up to 57% Off Gear We Love
item.description: Cyber Monday is over, but many deals are still available, at least for now. These are the absolute best discounts on gear we've tested ourselves.

item.title: The spectacle of Bryan Johnson and his livestreamed shrooms trip
item.description: Bryan Johnson livestreamed his shrooms trip -- which included both Grimes and Marc Benioff -- as part of his controversial longevity research.

item.title: Android 16 adds AI notification summaries, new customization options, and more
item.description: The rollout of the new Android 16 features, which are first coming to Pixel devices, marks a new chapter in how Android updates work, as the company i...

item.title: Your Data Might Determine How Much You Pay for Eggs
item.description: A newly enacted New York law requires retailers to say whether your data influences the price of basic goods like a dozen eggs or toilet paper, but no...

item.title: The 55 Best Shows on Disney+, WIRED’s Picks (December 2025)
item.description: The Beatles Anthology, Percy Jackson and the Olympians, and Fire and Water: Making The Avatar Films are just a few of the shows you should be watching...
